messages.text:
Wow, I missed it too. Thanks.

On 2 November 2011 11:19,  <bradfitz@golang.org> wrote:
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5308077/diff/1/doc/devel/weekly.html
> File doc/devel/weekly.html (right):
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5308077/diff/1/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode27
> doc/devel/weekly.html:27: Error to String. Package fmt's Print formats
> both Stringers and errors:
> from String to Error
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5308077/
>

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

http://codereview.appspot.com/5308077/diff/1/doc/devel/weekly.html
File doc/devel/weekly.html (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5308077/diff/1/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode27
doc/devel/weekly.html:27: Error to String. Package fmt's Print formats both Stringers and errors:
from String to Error

ouch, thanks (my bad)

On Tue, Nov 1, 2011 at 22:19,  <bradfitz@golang.org> wrote:
> both Stringers and errors:
> from String to Error
